system:

../implementation_gtk/ev_item_imp.xmlEV_ITEM_IMP redefine ../implementation_gtk/ev_menu_item_imp.xml#f_interfaceinterface, ../implementation_gtk/ev_menu_item_imp.xml#f_makemake, ../implementation_gtk/ev_menu_item_imp.xml#f_needs_event_boxNeeds_event_box end

create ../implementation_gtk/ev_menu_item_imp.xml#f_makemake
feature {NONE} -- Initialization
f_needs_event_box../implementation_gtk/ev_menu_item_imp.xml#f_needs_event_boxNeeds_event_box: FalseBOOLEAN = False -- Does a_widget need an event box?
f_is_dockable../implementation_gtk/ev_menu_item_imp.xml#f_is_dockableIs_dockable: FalseBOOLEAN = False -- Is Current dockable?
f_old_make../implementation_gtk/ev_menu_item_imp.xml#f_old_makeold_make (an_interface: attached like ../implementation_gtk/ev_menu_item_imp.xml#f_interfaceinterface) -- Create a menu. do ../implementation_interface/ev_any_i.xml#f_assign_interfaceassign_interface (an_interface) end
f_initialize_menu_item../implementation_gtk/ev_menu_item_imp.xml#f_initialize_menu_iteminitialize_menu_item -- Create and initialize gtk menu object. do ../implementation_gtk/ev_any_imp.xml#f_set_c_objectset_c_object ({../implementation_gtk/gtk2.xmlGTK2}.../implementation_gtk/gtk2.xml#f_gtk_image_menu_item_newgtk_image_menu_item_new) ../implementation_gtk/ev_pixmapable_imp.xml#f_pixmapable_imp_initializepixmapable_imp_initialize {../implementation_gtk/gtk2.xmlGTK2}.../implementation_gtk/gtk2.xml#f_gtk_image_menu_item_set_imagegtk_image_menu_item_set_image (../implementation_gtk/ev_menu_item_imp.xml#f_menu_itemmenu_item, ../implementation_gtk/ev_pixmapable_imp.xml#f_pixmap_boxpixmap_box) end
f_make../implementation_gtk/ev_menu_item_imp.xml#f_makemake -- Initialize Current local box: FalsePOINTER do ../implementation_gtk/ev_menu_item_imp.xml#f_initialize_menu_iteminitialize_menu_item ../implementation_gtk/ev_gtk_widget_imp.xml#f_makePrecursor {../implementation_gtk/ev_item_imp.xmlEV_ITEM_IMP} ../implementation_gtk/ev_any_imp.xml#f_real_signal_connect_afterreal_signal_connect_after {../implementation_gtk/gtk.xmlGTK}.../implementation_gtk/gtk.xml#f_gtk_widget_showgtk_widget_show (box) if ../implementation_gtk/ev_pixmapable_imp.xml#f_pixmap_boxpixmap_box = Falsedefault_pointer then ../implementation_gtk/ev_pixmapable_imp.xml#f_pixmapable_imp_initializepixmapable_imp_initialize {../implementation_gtk/gtk.xmlGTK}.../implementation_gtk/gtk.xml#f_gtk_box_pack_startgtk_box_pack_start (box, ../implementation_gtk/ev_pixmapable_imp.xml#f_pixmap_boxpixmap_box, False, True, 0) end {../implementation_gtk/gtk.xmlGTK}.../implementation_gtk/gtk.xml#f_gtk_box_pack_startgtk_box_pack_start (box, ../implementation_gtk/ev_textable_imp.xml#f_text_labeltext_label, False, True, 0) ../implementation_gtk/ev_menu_item_imp.xml#f_accel_labelaccel_label := {../implementation_gtk/gtk.xmlGTK}.../implementation_gtk/gtk.xml#f_gtk_label_newgtk_label_new (Falsedefault_pointer) 1.0, {FalseREAL_32} 0.5) {../implementation_gtk/gtk.xmlGTK}.../implementation_gtk/gtk.xml#f_gtk_misc_set_paddinggtk_misc_set_padding (../implementation_gtk/ev_menu_item_imp.xml#f_accel_labelaccel_label, 0, 0) {../implementation_gtk/gtk.xmlGTK}.../implementation_gtk/gtk.xml#f_gtk_box_pack_startgtk_box_pack_start (box, ../implementation_gtk/ev_menu_item_imp.xml#f_accel_labelaccel_label, True, True, 2) {../implementation_gtk/gtk.xmlGTK}.../implementation_gtk/gtk.xml#f_gtk_label_set_justifygtk_label_set_justify (../implementation_gtk/ev_menu_item_imp.xml#f_accel_labelaccel_label, {../implementation_gtk/gtk.xmlGTK}.../implementation_gtk/gtk.xml#f_gtk_justify_right_enumgtk_justify_right_enum) end
f_accel_label../implementation_gtk/ev_menu_item_imp.xml#f_accel_labelaccel_label: FalsePOINTER
feature -- Element change
f_set_text../implementation_gtk/ev_menu_item_imp.xml#f_set_textset_text (a_text: FalseREADABLE_STRING_GENERAL) -- Assign a_text to ../implementation_gtk/ev_textable_imp.xml#f_texttext. local l_split_list: detachable FalseLIST [FalseREADABLE_STRING_GENERAL] a_cs: ../implementation_gtk/ev_gtk_c_string.xmlEV_GTK_C_STRING do if a_text.Falsehas ('%T'.Falseto_character_32) then l_split_list := a_text.Falsesplit ('%T'.Falseto_character_32) end if l_split_list /= Void and then l_split_list.Falsecount = 2 then ../implementation_gtk/ev_textable_imp.xml#f_set_textPrecursor {../implementation_gtk/ev_textable_imp.xmlEV_TEXTABLE_IMP} (l_split_list @ 1) if attached ../implementation_gtk/ev_textable_imp.xml#f_real_textreal_text as l_text then l_text.Falseappend_character ('%T'.Falseto_character_32) l_text.Falseappend_string_general (l_split_list @ 2) else check real_text_set: False end end a_cs := create {attached ../implementation_gtk/ev_gtk_c_string.xmlEV_GTK_C_STRING}.../implementation_gtk/ev_gtk_c_string.xml#f_set_with_eiffel_stringset_with_eiffel_string ({FalseSTRING_32}" " + l_split_list @ 2) {../implementation_gtk/gtk.xmlGTK}.../implementation_gtk/gtk.xml#f_gtk_label_set_textgtk_label_set_text (../implementation_gtk/ev_menu_item_imp.xml#f_accel_labelaccel_label, a_cs.../implementation_gtk/ev_gtk_c_string.xml#f_itemitem) {../implementation_gtk/gtk.xmlGTK}.../implementation_gtk/gtk.xml#f_gtk_widget_showgtk_widget_show (../implementation_gtk/ev_menu_item_imp.xml#f_accel_labelaccel_label) else ../implementation_gtk/ev_textable_imp.xml#f_set_textPrecursor {../implementation_gtk/ev_textable_imp.xmlEV_TEXTABLE_IMP} (a_text) {../implementation_gtk/gtk.xmlGTK}.../implementation_gtk/gtk.xml#f_gtk_widget_hidegtk_widget_hide (../implementation_gtk/ev_menu_item_imp.xml#f_accel_labelaccel_label) end end
feature {../implementation_gtk/ev_menu_item_list_imp.xmlEV_MENU_ITEM_LIST_IMP} -- Implementation
f_menu_item../implementation_gtk/ev_menu_item_imp.xml#f_menu_itemmenu_item: FalsePOINTER -- Pointer to the GtkMenuItem widget. do Result := ../implementation_gtk/ev_any_imp.xml#f_c_objectc_object end
feature {../implementation_interface/ev_any_i.xmlEV_ANY_I, ../implementation_gtk/ev_intermediary_routines.xmlEV_INTERMEDIARY_ROUTINES} -- Implementation
f_allow_on_activate../implementation_gtk/ev_menu_item_imp.xml#f_allow_on_activateallow_on_activate: FalseBOOLEAN -- Is the activate signal allowed to be propagated? do Result := ../implementation_gtk/ev_item_imp.xml#f_parent_impparent_imp /= Void end
f_accelerators_enabled../implementation_gtk/ev_menu_item_imp.xml#f_accelerators_enabledAccelerators_enabled: FalseBOOLEAN = True -- Does Current have keyboard accelerators enabled?
f_on_activate../implementation_gtk/ev_menu_item_imp.xml#f_on_activateon_activate local p_imp: detachable ../implementation_gtk/ev_menu_item_list_imp.xmlEV_MENU_ITEM_LIST_IMP do p_imp ?= ../implementation_gtk/ev_item_imp.xml#f_parent_impparent_imp if p_imp /= Void then if p_imp.../implementation_interface/ev_menu_item_list_action_sequences_i.xml#f_item_select_actions_internalitem_select_actions_internal /= Void then p_imp.../implementation_interface/ev_menu_item_list_action_sequences_i.xml#f_item_select_actionsitem_select_actions.../interface/ev_lite_action_sequence.xml#f_callcall ([../implementation_interface/ev_any_i.xml#f_attached_interfaceattached_interface]) end {../implementation_gtk/gtk.xmlGTK}.../implementation_gtk/gtk.xml#f_gtk_menu_shell_deactivategtk_menu_shell_deactivate (p_imp.../implementation_gtk/ev_menu_item_list_imp.xml#f_list_widgetlist_widget) end {../implementation_gtk/gtk.xmlGTK}.../implementation_gtk/gtk.xml#f_gtk_menu_item_deselectgtk_menu_item_deselect (../implementation_gtk/ev_menu_item_imp.xml#f_menu_itemmenu_item) if ../implementation_interface/ev_menu_item_action_sequences_i.xml#f_select_actions_internalselect_actions_internal /= Void then ../implementation_interface/ev_menu_item_action_sequences_i.xml#f_select_actions_internalselect_actions_internal.../interface/ev_lite_action_sequence.xml#f_callcall (Void) end end
feature {../interface/ev_any.xmlEV_ANY, ../implementation_interface/ev_any_i.xmlEV_ANY_I} -- Implementation
f_interface../implementation_gtk/ev_menu_item_imp.xml#f_interfaceinterface: detachable ../interface/ev_menu_item.xmlEV_MENU_ITEM note option: stable attribute end
